name: Ardanteia
description:
CURRENTLY IN EARLY ACCESS!

Stranded in a strange land you must use your wits to survive. Find items and tools of power to manipulate the world around you so that you can find your way home again. If you're diligent and determined enough you may even have something to show for your ordeal...

Ardanteia is an open world fantasy themed roguelike based on graphical tiles with a focus on world manipulation and exploration.
